column2: I had the Wallflower [$15]. My friends had the Paper Plane [$15] and a glass of the Picpoul [$13]
column3: the latter of which was the recommended pairing with the tagliatelle. Everyone enjoyed their drinks
column4: and found that they went well with the dishes we ordered. When combined with the pork shoulder
column5: I found that the Wallflower provided that brightness I was looking for!
